definition: sacrifice to drive away calamity/to dispel/to drive away/to remove

sentences.english: Conclusion Expectorant can shorten the duration of moderate and severe acute exacerbations of asthma in children.
sentences.chinese: 結論祛痰藥能縮短中重度兒童急性哮喘的病程。

sentences.english: Objective Research dry cough expectorant cough syrup- Pharmacodynamic.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究乾咳清糖漿的止咳祛痰的藥效學。

sentences.english: The control group only gives relieves a cough, dispels phlegm treats for one week.
sentences.chinese: 對照組僅予止咳，祛痰治療一週。

sentences.english: Syrup of Tolu is used as a vehicle for expectorant mixtures.
sentences.chinese: 吐魯糖漿是祛痰藥物的和藥物。

sentences.english: Eliminating phlegm and resolving stasis soup was more effective than westen routine treatment.
sentences.chinese: 加用祛痰化瘀湯治療心絞痛療效更好。

sentences.english: Still have the sea floatstone in Chinese traditional medicine, like thick emery wheel, have the effect of make expectoration easy.
sentences.chinese: 還有中藥中的海浮石，像粗砂輪一樣，有祛痰的作用。

sentences.english: Helps loosen phlegm (mucus) & thin bronchial secretions to rid the bronchial passageways of bothersome mucus & drain bronchial tubes.
sentences.chinese: 祛痰，幫助緩解減輕支氣管的粘液，讓呼吸道暢通。

sentences.english: Humid moist air prevents the drying of mucus and it further assists the expectorant process.
sentences.chinese: 溼潤的空氣防止黏液乾燥，並進一步促進祛痰過程。

sentences.english: FFM have good eliminating phlegm effect.
sentences.chinese: 複方麥冬丸有較好的祛痰作用。

sentences.english: By the methods of phenol red excretion and ciliary movement to determine the expectorantic effect of Shenlu Yin.
sentences.chinese: 採用酚紅法和纖毛運動法，測定參蘆飲祛痰作用。

sentences.english: Tracheal phenol red test was conducted to investigate the effect of phlegm expelling.
sentences.chinese: 用氣管段酚紅法研究其祛痰作用。

sentences.english: The cough medicine contains an expectorant.

definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
(TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm
